events.message: The applicant submitted a request for a personal loan to cover upcoming medical bills after recent treatments.
The submitted loan application was categorised as a personal loan based on the stated purpose of covering medical expenses.
A loan officer was assigned to handle the personal loan application and reach out to the applicant for next steps.
Initial review of the applicant’s submitted information showed eligibility for the personal loan product.
Requested copies of recent medical bills, proof of income, and identification documents from the applicant.
Applicant successfully submitted all requested documents including medical bills and income verification promptly.
Completed the credit check on the applicant and found a satisfactory credit score with no recent delinquencies.
Risk assessment was completed factoring in credit score, debt-to-income ratio, and medical expense impact.
Presented the applicant with the offer for a personal loan at a competitive interest rate suitable for their needs.
Applicant provided positive feedback on the offered terms and expressed willingness to proceed with the loan.
After thorough verification and review, the personal loan was officially approved by the credit committee.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant’s designated bank account as per the approved personal loan agreement.
Followed up with the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan and to provide assistance with any questions.
The loan application case was closed successfully after all processes were completed and funds received.
